enterCustomTermsHere: Enter custom agreement terms here, or leave blank to use default terms.
editTermsNote: These terms will be included in the generated agreement. Save before printing if you make changes.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement cannot be generated for this booking. It might not be a facility booking or it's not yet approved.
providerAddressPlaceholder: Oromia Education Main Office, Adama, Ethiopia
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified. All payments are non-refundable except under conditions outlined herein.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than [X] days prior to the event start date will forfeit the full rental fee. Cancellations made before this period may receive a partial refund, subject to a [Y]% administrative fee.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: Client agrees to use the facility only for the purpose stated in the booking and in accordance_with all applicable laws and center regulations. Any damage to the facility or equipment caused by the client or attendees will be the financial responsibility of the client.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: {siteName} is not responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to personal property of the client or attendees. The client agrees to indemnify and hold harmless {siteName} from any claims arising out of their use of the facility.
agreementNotApplicable: Agreements are only applicable for facility bookings.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing. It might be pending administrative action or not yet sent.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as the company representative who made this booking to view the agreement.
agreementUploadedSuccessfully: The signed agreement has been uploaded and the booking status updated.
errorUploadingAgreementActual: There was an error uploading your signed agreement. Please try again.
failedToUploadToCloudinary: Failed to upload file to cloud storage. Please check file type and size.

myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your active dormitory booking using your phone number.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter your phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings.
noActiveBookingsFoundForPhone: No active approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Follow the instructions below to complete your payment via bank transfer.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the payment, please send a screenshot of your transaction receipt to our Telegram Bot: {botUsername}. Make sure to include your Booking ID and the phone number {phoneNumber} in your message for faster verification.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending your proof, our admin team will verify your payment and confirm your booking.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing from the request.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not currently expected for this booking, or it has already been processed. Please check your booking status or contact support.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your request to book a facility has been received and is now pending review and approval from our team. You will be notified via email or phone once it's confirmed. If payment is required before confirmation, we will contact you with instructions.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, it appears you already have a booking (approved or pending) for this phone number on the selected start date. You cannot make another dormitory booking for the same day.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: A check for duplicate bookings was skipped due to a missing database index. Your booking will proceed. Please contact support if you intended to modify an existing booking.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (Firestore index) is required to properly check for duplicate bookings. Please contact the site administrator to resolve this. Your booking cannot be completed at this time.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: When making the payment, please use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference or reason for the transfer.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below with your phone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services and facilities.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure and well-equipped dormitories for individuals and groups, ensuring a pleasant stay.
brochureHallsDesc: Modern halls and sections suitable for trainings, meetings, workshops, and various events.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and customizable catering options, including lunch and refreshment services for your events.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is a premier center dedicated to providing top-notch accommodation and event facilities. We aim to support educational and professional development by offering a conducive environment for learning, training, and collaboration. Our commitment is to deliver excellent service and value to all our guests and clients.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and many more amenities designed for your comfort and convenience.
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff and excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and guest satisfaction.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: We are eager to host you or your event. Contact us for inquiries or proceed to book online.
pageNotFoundMessage: Oops! The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Let's get you back on track.

phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This phone number can be used for easier communication. (Optional)
